short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear YouTube recommendations, suggestions, shorts and homepage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension to hide distractions in YouTube and help you focus. 

- It removes YouTube shorts recommendations in search results.
- It replaces the cluttered homepage with a clean homepage, with only 3 options, Search, 'For You' and 'Consume'.
- Consume mode doesn't remove anything but has a limit on the time you watch videos for, you set the limit every day.
- 'For You' mode takes you to the subscriptions while removing any distractions.
- It removes the sidebar.
- It limits YouTube shorts to scroll only 3 times.
- The homepage shows you how much time you spent on YouTube.

Enjoy *not* wasting time
